body.p:
Office Garrard Circuit Court
Decr 18th 1863.
Honl. Thos. E. Bramlette.
Sir.
I send you herewith, a copy of an Indictment, found at the Feby term 1863 of this Court vs John Brown -- Said Brown fled from the officers an is now in Orange County Indiana.

I would suggest Agrippa Scott, of Paoli Indiana, as a suitable person to act as agent in conveying said Brown when apprehended to this jail -- he is well acquainted with Brown, and was a witness before the grand jury -- it is through th said Scott that I get the information of Browns whereabouts --

Respectfully.
W. D. Hopper clk
Garrard Circuit Court

Requisition on Indiana for John Brown
23d Dec/63
